synopsis.text: Secret adventures and untold tales unfold in the enchanting world of Utawarerumono, where the enigmatic Hakuoro, still donning his irremovable mask and haunted by beastly visions, finds himself entwined in a series of captivating side-stories. In the serene aftermath of war, the villagers of Tusukuru embrace the tranquility, only to be disrupted by the discovery of an abandoned baby. Urutori, tasked with the temporary care of the infant, finds herself forming an unbreakable bond with the child. Meanwhile, Eruruu, the village's skilled healer, is snatched by a mysterious group, who seek her expertise in crafting a special elixir. Lastly, a seemingly ordinary fishing trip becomes an unexpected adventure for Touka, as she is left in charge of the catch. Delve into these delightful escapades, where the ordinary intertwines with the extraordinary, and where the heartwarming bonds between friends and family take center stage.
